name: Space (Flaming3Z)
description:
Ultimately, relaxing.

The game was made for http://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=135 and the theme was "Space". I had 15 minutes left and I made this relaxing experience.

Use [SPACE] to switch where you are in space.

Use [ESCAPE] to escape this endless torment.

Use [R] to reset the game and to possibly change the music.
